biotools.summary:
FLOWMAPR is an R package  for extensible analysis of single-cell datasets including FCS files generated from mass/flow cytometry or data.frames of other single-cell data processed in R.
It is a graph-based, force-directed layout algorithm for trajectory mapping in single-cell time course datasets.

bioschemas.name: FLOWMAPR
